Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2011 11:59PM lostmymittens wrote: Interesting.  Thank you for the info carpediem!   I have done this as well... pretty much every angle possible trying to figure out what's going on in there..ha.  But it is much more difficult to see the dimple doing it this way.  If I pull up, then the dimple is super obvious.  It's odd that tissue can make an indent...you'd expect it to be fat, like cellulite or something, you know what I mean?  But it's breast tissue...so odd.
Posts.Title: A breast indent/dimple when skin is taut? lostmymittens SarahsMom

Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2011 05:06PM lostmymittens wrote: Yes.  It is still swollen, unfortunately.  Thank you for the link, I will definitely take a look!
Posts.Title: A breast indent/dimple when skin is taut? lostmymittens SarahsMom

Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2011 05:15PM lostmymittens wrote: Luan,  I know, I agree that I should feel confident since I had the MRI done and the breast surgeon who reviewed it said there was nothing to worry about.  But I still feel like something isn't right.  My breast doesn't look or feel normal, and it doesn't match my other breast like it did 5 months ago.    My mom spoke to the breast surgeon when he called, so I would like to call back and hear the result from the surgeon, not my mom.
Posts.Title: A breast indent/dimple when skin is taut? lostmymittens SarahsMom

Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2011 06:13PM lostmymittens wrote: Thanks Luan, I will keep that in mind!!  The breast surgeon is a pretty cooperative guy, though, and does what he can to put the patient at ease (including more tests, if asked for).  I guess I should make a follow up appointment with him before I decide to go to someone else.  Anyone else know about this dimple issue?  Is it because I'm pulling up on my chest and since I have lumpy tissue under there, I'm just causing a harmless dimple?  Or is a dimple NEVER a good sign?  Do fibrocystic breasts always look a weird shape if you were to tighten the skin around them??  The dimple seems pretty big, about the length of a pinky finger..looks like you could fit a mini M&M in it, maybe a normal sized one.
Posts.Title: A breast indent/dimple when skin is taut? lostmymittens SarahsMom
